snippet: The move by the party of Joko Widodo, who has become a political phenomenon, ended speculation over whether the party chairwoman would stand in his way.
abstract: Joko Widodo, popular governor of Indonesia's capital Jakarta receives his opposition party's nod as its presidential candidate; move by party ends speculation over whether chairwoman would stand in his way.
lead_paragraph: The move by the party of Joko Widodo, who has become a political phenomenon, ended speculation over whether the party chairwoman would stand in his way.

headline.main: Governor of Jakarta Receives His Party’s Nod for President
headline.print_headline: Governor of Jakarta Receives His Party’s Nod for President
